lead_paragraph: Dieudonné M’bala M’bala stood trial in criminal court on Wednesday over a comment he made lamenting that a prominent Jewish journalist did not die in “the gas chambers,” prosecutors said.

byline.original: By DAN BILEFSKY and MAÏA de la BAUME

snippet: Dieudonné M’bala M’bala stood trial in criminal court on Wednesday over a comment he made lamenting that a prominent Jewish journalist did not die in “the gas chambers,” prosecutors said.

headline.main: French Comedian Stands Trial Over Comment Against Jewish Journalist
headline.print_headline: French Government Hopes Graphic Video Will Stop Youths From Turning to Jihad
